title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente.
Fry the pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Whisk eggs with cheese and black pepper.
Combine hot pasta with pancetta and mix with egg mixture.
Serve immediately with extra cheese on top.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill chicken until charred.
Sauté onions and garlic in a pan.
Add tomato puree and cook until thick.
Stir in grilled chicken and heavy cream.
Simmer for 5 minutes and serve with rice.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A Russian dish of sautéed beef served in a creamy mushroom sauce over egg noodles or rice.
instructions: Cook egg noodles according to package instructions.
Sauté onion, garlic, and mushrooms until soft.
Add beef slices and cook until browned.
Pour in beef broth and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in sour cream and serve over egg noodles.

title: Sushi Rolls
summary: A Japanese dish consisting of vinegared rice, seafood, and vegetables rolled in seaweed.
instructions: Cook sushi rice and season with rice vinegar.
Lay nori sheet on a sushi mat and spread rice evenly.
Place fish, cucumber, and avocado in a row.
Roll tightly using the mat and seal the edge with water.
Cut into bite-sized pieces and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple Italian pizza topped with tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.
instructions: Mix flour, yeast, salt, and warm water to form dough and let rise for 1 hour.
Roll out dough into a thin crust.
Spread tomato sauce and add mozzarella slices.
Bake at 220°C (425°F) for 10-15 minutes.
Top with fresh basil before serving.

title: Paella
summary: A traditional Spanish rice dish with seafood, saffron, and a variety of vegetables.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pan and sauté onions, garlic, and bell pepper.
Add diced tomatoes, paprika, and saffron threads.
Stir in rice and coat with the mixture.
Pour in chicken broth and let simmer for 15 minutes.
Add seafood and cook until mussels open and shrimp turn pink.
Season with salt and pepper, then serve hot.

title: Tacos Al Pastor
summary: Mexican tacos made with marinated pork, pineapple, and fresh cilantro on corn tortillas.
instructions: Marinate pork with pineapple juice, achiote, cumin, and paprika for 2 hours.
Grill pork until caramelized and crispy.
Warm corn tortillas on a dry pan.
Fill tortillas with pork, chopped onion, and cilantro.
Serve with lime wedges.

title: Ratatouille
summary: A French vegetable stew made with tomatoes, zucchini, eggplant, and bell peppers.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onions and garlic.
Add eggplant and cook until slightly softened.
Stir in bell peppers, zucchini, and tomatoes.
Season with thyme, salt, and pepper.
Cover and let simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve warm as a side or main dish.

title: Butter Chicken
summary: A rich and creamy Indian dish with tender chicken cooked in a spiced tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, garam masala, and turmeric for at least 1 hour.
Cook chicken in a pan until golden brown, then set aside.
In the same pan, melt butter and sauté onions and garlic.
Add tomato puree and let simmer for 10 minutes.
Return chicken to the pan and mix well.
Stir in heavy cream, season with salt and pepper, and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Pho
summary: A Vietnamese noodle soup consisting of broth, rice noodles, herbs, and meat.
ingredients: Fresh basil, bean sprouts, and lime wedges
instructions: Simmer beef bones in water for 4 hours to create broth.
Add charred onion, ginger, star anise, cinnamon, and cloves.
Strain the broth and season with fish sauce.
Cook rice noodles separately and place in bowls.
Top with raw beef slices and pour hot broth over them.
Garnish with fresh basil, bean sprouts, and lime wedges before serving.

title: Moussaka
summary: A Greek casserole made with layers of eggplant, ground meat, and béchamel sauce.
instructions: Brush eggplant slices with olive oil and roast until soft.
Sauté onions and garlic, then add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in tomato sauce and cinnamon, and simmer for 15 minutes.
Layer eggplant and meat sauce in a baking dish.
Top with béchamel sauce and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 30 minutes and let cool before serving.

title: Biryani
summary: A fragrant South Asian rice dish cooked with spices, meat, and sometimes vegetables.
ingredients: 1/2 tsp saffron, soaked in warm milk
instructions: Marinate meat with yogurt, biryani masala, and turmeric for at least 1 hour.
Sauté onions and garlic in a pan, then add marinated meat.
Cook until browned, then add chicken broth and let simmer.
Parboil basmati rice and layer it over the meat mixture.
Drizzle saffron-infused milk over the rice.
Cover and cook on low heat for 20 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and fried onions before serving.
